articles.title: Biden Protects US Forests But Struggles On Biggest Climate Goals
articles.description: President Joe Biden marked Earth Day on Friday by ordering protections for ancient forests and pondering a future without his beloved gas-guzzling Corvette sports car, but after 14 months in office his more ambitious climate goals look elusive.
